Sentencas: Infiltration is an effective way to improve the performance of the oxygen electrode for solid oxide cells (SOCs).
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Most studies on infiltrated SOCs are carried out on button cells with a small active area.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Here, we report on the preparation of large-area fuel-electrode -supported SOCs with a La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-delta (LSC) infiltrated gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) oxygen electrode.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of the resulting SOCs is examined at 4 x 4 cm(2) level (active area).
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: The cell delivers a power density of 1.08 W cm(-2) at 0.6 V and 750 degrees C in fuel cell mode with high fuel and oxygen utilization of 52 and 57%, respectively; in electrolysis mode, the current density reaches 1.07 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V and 750 degrees C with a steam utilization of 60%.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Additionally, the influence of feed gas composition on cell performance and the short-term durability of the cell in electrolysis mode are studied.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) results and the post-test microstructural characterization demonstrate that there is no visible degradation of the LSC infiltrated CGO oxygen electrode after the durability test.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production

Sentencas: These results highlight the potential of large-scale production of high-performance SOCs by designing nanostructured electrode via infiltration.
Titulo: Large-area solid oxide cells with La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ infiltrated oxygen electrodes for electricity generation and hydrogen production
